name: Accelerating Tableau simplex method with Parallel and Re-configurable Computing
tagline: A implementation of tableau simplex method with parallel accelerators using OpenCL standard
body:
### General Info
This webpage is dedicated to my Undergraduate Research Opportunity Program(UROP) Project, "Accelerating Tableau Simplex Method with parallel and re-configurable computing". The source code and project report are downloadable by clicking the icons at the top right corner. This project is not yet finished and when I finish my exams and graduate school applications, I will hopefully continue to further optimize my codes. For further clarification contact me via Github.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
